窮す: (きゅうす) - to be hard pressed/to be at a loss; to become poor/to be reduced to poverty
窮する: (きゅうする) - to be hard pressed/to be at a loss; to become poor/to be reduced to poverty
窮すれば通ず: (きゅうすればつうず) - Necessity is the mother of invention; There is always some way out of a difficulty if you really look for one
窮まり: (きわまり) - extremity; end; bound; limit
窮まりない: (きわまりない) - (suffix often in kana) extremely/in the extreme/knows no bounds (e.g. rudeness)/unparalleled; boundless (e.g. universe, ocean)/limitless
窮まり無い: (きわまりない) - (suffix often in kana) extremely/in the extreme/knows no bounds (e.g. rudeness)/unparalleled; boundless (e.g. universe, ocean)/limitless
窮まる: (きわまる) - to terminate; to reach an extreme; to take to the extreme; to be in a dilemma; to be at an end
窮める: (きわめる) - (esp. 極める, 窮める) to carry to extremes/to go to the end of something; (esp. 究める) to investigate thoroughly/to master
窮乏: (きゅうぼう) - poverty; destitution; privation; indigence; penury
窮余の一策: (きゅうよのいっさく) - desperate measure; last-ditch effort
窮地に陥る: (きゅうちにおちいる) - to be caught in a dilemma; to get into a scrape
窮屈: (kyuukutsu) - narrow, tight, cramped; formal, stiff, strict, ceremonious, rigid , narrow, tight, cramped; formal, stiff, strict, ceremonious, rigid; constrained, uncomfortable; tight (por exemplo, finanças)
窮屈袋: (きゅうくつぶくろ) - (joc)  hakama; man's formal divided shirt
窮極: (きゅうきょく) - ultimate; extreme; final; eventual
窮極目的: (きゅうきょくもくてき) - final aim; final end; supreme end
窮死: (きゅうし) - dying in miserable circumstances
窮民: (きゅうみん) - poor people; the poor
窮状: (きゅうじょう) - distress; wretched condition
窮理: (きゅうり) - study of natural laws; branch of neo-Confusianist scholarship
窮策: (きゅうさく) - desperate measure; expedient of last resort
窮追: (きゅうつい) - cornered; driven to the wall
窮鳥懐に入れば猟師もこれを殺さず: (きゅうちょうふところにいればりょうしもこれをころさず) - Even the hunter will refrain from killing the bird that has flown to him for shelter
窮鳥懐に入れば猟師も殺さず: (きゅうちょうふところにいればりょうしもころさず) - Even the hunter will refrain from killing the bird that has flown to him for shelter
窮鼠: (きゅうそ) - cornered rat or mouse
窮鼠噛猫: (きゅうそごうびょう) - (yoji) A cornered rat will bite the cat; One who is cornered will fight like a devil
窮鼠猫を噛む: (きゅうそねこをかむ) - a cornered rat will bite a cat; despair turns cowards courageous
窯元: (かまもと) - pottery (i.e. the place); potter
窯出し: (かまだし) - removing pots from kiln
窯変: (ようへん) - deformation during firing (ceramics); color variation during firing
窶す: (やつす) - to be absorbed in/to lose oneself to; to disguise oneself as/to adorn oneself
窶れる: (やつれる) - to be haggard; to be gaunt; to be emaciated; to be worn out (e.g. illness, worry)
窺いしる: (うかがいしる) - to perceive; to understand
窺い探る: (うかがいさぐる) - to spy out
窺い知る: (うかがいしる) - to perceive; to understand
窺う: (うかがう) - to peep (through)/to peek/to examine (esp. covertly); to await (one's chance); (usu. used passively) to guess/to infer/to gather/to surmise
窺く: (のぞく) - to peek (though a keyhole, gap, etc.); to look down into (a ravine, etc.); to peek into (a shop, bookstore, etc.); to sneak a look at/to take a quick look at; to peep (through a telescope, microscope, etc.); to stick out (a scarf from a collar, etc.)/to peek through (sky through a forest canopy, etc.); (esp. 臨く)  to face
竃: (そう) - Fogão de cozinha, fogão, fogão para cozinhar, lareira, forno (de cozinha)
竃神: (かまどがみ) - tutelary deities of the hearth
竃馬: (カマドウマ) - camel cricket (Diestrammena apicalis); camelback cricket; cave cricket; spider cricket
竄する: (ざんする) - to exile/to banish; to revise the wording of a phrase
竄匿: (ざんとく) - diving under cover and hiding
竈: (そう) - Lareira, buraco para fumaça na lareira; fogão, forno (cozinha)
竈神: (かまどがみ) - tutelary deities of the hearth
竈突: (くど) - the rear of an old-fashioned Japanese hearth from which smoke was exhausted; (in Kyoto dialect) the hearth itself
竈風呂: (かまぶろ) - steam bath (often using brine)
竈馬: (カマドウマ) - camel cricket (Diestrammena apicalis); camelback cricket; cave cricket; spider cricket
立たす: (たたす) - to help a person stand; to get someone to their feet; to raise; to rouse
立ち: (tachi) - partida, início, começo; sendo usado, sendo consumido, esgotado, partida, início, começo; sendo usado, sendo consumido, esgotado; passagem do tempo, decurso
立ちあがる: (たちあがる) - to stand up/to get up; to rise; to recover; to take action/to start; {sumo} to make the initial charge; to start up/to boot up
立ちいる: (たちいる) - to enter/to trespass; to interfere/to meddle/to pry into
立ちくらみ: (たちくらみ) - dizziness (from standing up too fast); orthostatic syncope; lightheadedness; vertigo
立ちこめる: (たちこめる) - to hang over; to shroud; to enshroud; to envelop; to screen
立ちすくむ: (たちすくむ) - to be petrified; to be unable to move; to be paralyzed (with horror); to be stupefied (with amazement)
立ちっぱ: (たちっぱ) - stand on one's feet for a long time
立ちっぱなし: (たちっぱなし) - stand on one's feet for a long time
立ちつくす: (たちつくす) - to stand stock still
立ちづめ: (たちづめ) - standing (for a long period of time); continuing to stand
立ちどまる: (たちどまる) - to stop; to halt; to stand still
立ちなおる: (たちなおる) - to regain one's footing/to get back on one's feet; to recover/(of the market) to improve
立ちのぼる: (たちのぼる) - to go up; to rise up
立ちはだかる: (たちはだかる) - to stand in the way (esp. with legs spread out); to block one's way; to obstruct (progress etc.)
立ちふさがる: (たちふさがる) - to stand in one's way
立ちまじる: (たちまじる) - to join (a group); to join companions
立ちん坊: (たちんぼ) - being kept standing (without doing anything); beggar/tramp
立ちション: (たちション) - urinating outdoors; urinating standing up
立ち上がり: (たちあがり) - start/beginning/build up; {baseb} how well a pitcher pitches at the start of the game
立ち上がる: (たちあがる) - to stand up/to get up; to rise; to recover; to take action/to start; {sumo} to make the initial charge; to start up/to boot up
立ち上げ: (たちあげ) - starting up (e.g. business, computer)
立ち上げる: (たちあげる) - to start (something); to start up; to boot (a computer); to launch (a business)
立ち上り: (たちあがり) - start/beginning/build up; {baseb} how well a pitcher pitches at the start of the game
立ち上る: (たちのぼる) - to go up; to rise up
立ち下がり: (たちさがり) - decay (e.g. charge, signal); trailing (e.g. edge); falling
立ち並ぶ: (たちならぶ) - (建ち並ぶ refers to buildings) to stand in a row (e.g. shops on a street)/to line in a row/to line; (立ち並ぶ, 立並ぶ only) to be equal to/to be on a par with
立ち交じる: (たちまじる) - to join (a group); to join companions
立ち交る: (たちまじる) - to join (a group); to join companions
立ち仕事: (たちしごと) - stand-up work; work performed standing
立ち会い: (たちあい) - (sometimes written 立ち合い) presence (e.g. of observer)/attendance; session/market
立ち会い分娩: (たちあいぶんべん) - {med} childbirth with father of child present; delivery with husband present
立ち会う: (たちあう) - to be present; to be witness to
立ち位置: (たちいち) - position (where one is standing)/place where one stands; position (in society)/status/role/station
立ち働く: (たちはたらく) - to go about one's work
立ち入り検査: (たちいりけんさ) - on-the-spot inspection; on-site inspection
立ち入り禁止: (たちいりきんし) - (on a sign) No Entry/No Trespassing/No Admittance/Off Limits/Keep Out/Keep Off; off-limits/restricted/forbidden
立ち入る: (たちいる) - to enter/to trespass; to interfere/to meddle/to pry into
